findings.liver: The liver is diffusely echogenic. The contour of the liver is smooth. There is no focal liver mass. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is trace perihepatic ascites.
findings.bile_ducts: There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CHD measures 4 mm.
findings.pancreas: The imaged portion of the pancreas appears enlarged, consistent with known ____.
findings.kidneys: Limited views of the right kidney show no hydronephrosis.
findings.retroperitoneum: The visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
